title: Local AAA encourages families to plan a vacation this summer
content: AAA encourages families to plan a vacation this summer (Photo: WRGT/WKEF)      DAYTON, Ohio (WRGT/WKEF)- The AAA summer travel kickoff was Saturday morning. The summer travel kickoff encourages parents and families to plan vacations together. Public Affairs Manager from AAA Cindy Antricam said people who take vacations are often much happier, healthier and more productive at work.    “We live in a hyper-connected society, we are on all the time. Many people never really take a break from work so, when they leave work at night, they take it with them.” said Antricam.    The kickoff is focusing on how families can disconnect from work or social media and spend more quality time with their loved ones. AAA offers a range of vacation packages that makes it easier for families to plan a getaway.    “When families take time for a vacation, the expectation is different. They won’t take their work with them.” said Antricam.    If you want more information or want to speak to an agent to plan your vacation visit this website .
